overview: Isa has been in a relationship with Vera for months. Although neither has any doubts, their relationship has developed like that of two girls playing hide-and-seek. By fleeing from their reality, they have made fantasy their refuge and consolation.  Hidden in a closet where she feels freer than she does in her own world, Isa will have to choose:  Break the silence or live as a Martyr?
title: Mártir
